website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy winter boot that has excellent traction and tends to run large.
pros: These boots stand out with outstanding traction and are praised for keeping feet warm and dry with a classic, stylish look
We love you can remove and wash the inner boot
cons: A few think these run a bit large and wide
Occasional reports of the exterior of the boots developing cracks in the toe creases over time

customer_reviews.title: Great Snow Shoe Until the Rubber Cracked On the Top
customer_reviews.text: I love Sorel's, I have two pairs. This pair I only use about a month a year going to and from my car. The second pair I use to shovel snow, chop wood and also go to and from my car. They are comfortable but the quality has slipped. I don't think the rubber should crack after four years and making them rather useless in snow/sleet etc, the usual weather we get here in Maine. Especially when 10 months a year they are in a heated dark closet. Not sure what other boot to recommend instead, maybe Bogs.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Runs large and won't honor price for exchange
customer_reviews.text: Good boots, but beware of the exchange policy. These boots run quite large... the biggest issue with that is that the seller doesn't honor original price when you exchange for a different size. Bought as an early Christmas gift for my husband and now am paying even more because he has to exchange them to size down.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Burge

customer_reviews.title: I have missed my Sorels
customer_reviews.text: I have had Sorels for years. I lived in Flagstaff Arizona and wore them daily in subzero temperatures. After 20 years they finally wore out. Since I was moving to the California mountains I didn't replace them. I finally got tired of frozen feet and wet socks in the snow and ordered new Sorels. It is so nice to have warm dry feet again. The boots fit just great and seem exactly like my old ones. They are made in Vietnam. The tread has awesome traction. I just wish I had bought these earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Howeth

customer_reviews.title: Sorels are the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Try to measure your foot acurately. Keep in mind that they run a little larger on purpose. This particular product I intentionally ordered a smidge smaller to have a little lighter and smaller boot. They are a wee bit tighter but will work great and stretch a bit for what I want. I have larger ones that are ovens. Please keep in mind that a real live Sorel boot for super cold weather should be a smidge big and little bit loosy goosey. A little more sock action and your feet will be in the tropics! And I'm taking sub zero.
customer_reviews.author: LIONATLARGE

customer_reviews.title: A classic!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are excellent at keeping your feet warm and dry while shoveling snow, snow mobile riding, etc. Snow can get in from the top if you aren't wearing gators and the snow is more than about a foot deep. Also, these are not the easiest boots to walk in, and it will become a chore if you try to walk fast or have a ways to go. There are multiple color options, which is a plus when trying to keep straight which pair belongs to which person when you and your sons wear the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality....Rubber Failure
customer_reviews.text: Have used these Pac's for years but when they started building them in China the quality went south. No longer use this Snow Boot
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at these for a LONG time, I am glad I finally bought them. They are quite pricey but definitely worth it! I listened to other buyers and got 1/2 size smaller and they fit PERFECTLY! Very comfortable and warm, I live in Northern Washington State and the winters are harsh. Just get them, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WhoisJG?

customer_reviews.title: FITTING OF BOOT
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I am very nervous to buy foot wear online because of the fitting. No worries here! The boots fit perfect. I wear a size 9 to 9 wide men's boot. There is enough room for a thicker style sock like a darn tough winter sock. Perfect for standard size socks. Might be a little tighter for a standard thick wool sock (unconfirmed). For my purpose though, I wear tech socks any way that wick the moisture from my feet with out having a thick sock so these boots fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe some reveiws
customer_reviews.text: Several reviews had said these Steve Corels run a size big, but I beg to differ. I am a 12 thru and thru and ordered an 11, which left my toes hitting the front of the boot. I've now ordered both an 11.5 and 12 and we'll see. I will update later. Beautiful boot though, great quality, heavy, but not for the amount of boot you're getting. Love the liner.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Now I can walk to the store in a blizzard if need be.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is excellent and I expect these will last a decade or more. Feet are kept dry and warm so I can keep moving when the roads are closed. Maybe only useful a time or two each year but damn they’re good to have close at hand when you need em. And my wife they’re sexy! That is a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen of the World

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs big
customer_reviews.text: These boots are excellent. They are very soft and comfortable. Sorel boots are very good quality and they feel great to wear. My feet never hurt even after wearing them for 12 hours and they stayed warm the whole time. I would highly recommend these boots to anyone. The hard part is that they run large. I normally wear a 10.5 shoe size and I had to get a 9.5 in these boots so that they would fit and wouldn't be too big. My only complaint is with the sizing, not with the quality of boots themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not warm boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my husband, but they do not keep his warm at all. I would like my money back, but he has already worn them, only once.
customer_reviews.author: carol a. geise

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Nice Boot.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the occasional Midwestern snow storm. They fit pretty good, but if anything run a bit large. They sit comfortably on the leg and have solid heat retention. These are mostly worn during winter tailgating and snow shoveling and so far handled what have been thrown at them.
customer_reviews.author: KC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed boots for snowblowing
customer_reviews.text: Nice warm boots! They def foot the bill on keeping my feet warm and dry while clearing the driveway. Also great to be able to just slip them on to take out the dogs with out worrying to tie them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Auclair

customer_reviews.title: A nice boot. True to fit.
customer_reviews.text: These boots seem to be well made, well insulated, and comfortable. I added a foot support under the inside boot. True to fit. I wear a 8.5 and that’s what I ordered and it fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: roman

customer_reviews.title: Love my Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my new snow boots.great price good quality.will definitely long a long time.but heads up I wear a 10 in men's.but the shoe is a snow boot so it's really bulky.i suggest go 2 sizes down from your regular size as I did to fit snug and perfect.im regularly wear a 10 in mens.But I need a 9 in men's to to just right.
customer_reviews.author: tyron  oats

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots for the winter
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes alot. They are comfortable, keep my feet warm in 0 degree weather and are water proof. The only con I have is that they look like moon boots. I wish they were just a bit smaller and I'd wear them out. Just to give other info about sizing, I'm about a 10 and a half in regular shoes and 10's were a bit big. Therefore I'd recommend going a size down. Otherwise so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: Keep your feet dry, pretty warm, what else do you want? I used this while working at a ski resort when I had outside work to do. (IT Guy)
customer_reviews.author: Lyric

customer_reviews.title: Expensive yet effective do research
customer_reviews.text: Went to store to test fit this product, i couldn't find this exact one but fitted a another Caribou series boot. Ordered the same size and came in a running a bit large. It's bulky which makes sense for wool socks and the boot liner but can't help but feel clunky. Overall all though the boot did well against it's first winter in upstate New York and Vermont. Also waterproof but what sold me was the signature style of the boot, just sad that they aren't made in Canada anymore but China.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of this brand. I know this is a respected brand. The boots are quite warm and pretty well constructed. I don't think I'll be sliding while I wear these this winter. I suspect that they will be more than sufficient to deal with the snow this season.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: The boots seem to be very well made, and would probably keep me warm , but they are too bulky for me. I wish I could have kept them, but, they have to go back
customer_reviews.author: Yosefaaron

customer_reviews.title: Quickly Fall Apart
customer_reviews.text: I have had three pairs of these in last few years. They all developed problems way too soon. Some had problems within days such as leaks in the seams between sole and upper. They all developed splits in the rubber around ball of foot and begin to leak after a few weeks of daily use. They look good but do not hold up. Years ago the quality was much better. I am now in the market for some other brand of this type of boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Large Calves
customer_reviews.text: They are Sorel boots...really the best brand out there for winter boots. If you have large calves, these are the boots for you. I have tried many other (cheaper) brands, and all of them are way too tight around my calves.
customer_reviews.author: Mime241

customer_reviews.title: Sorel Caribou boot
customer_reviews.text: Boots received on time as expected. Have been using Sorel boots for 40 years. They exceed other similar boots due to their use of D rings for laces which allows easy tight lacing as opposed to lacing with eyelets. Gusset on top is too narrow and must be slit about 2 inches to enable boot to be easily put on with ski socks. Otherwise boots fit as sized. Since Sorel was purchased by Columbia Sportswear the Sorel/Columbia boots have more narrow gusset than when Sorel was independent; apparently a creeping modification. Would recommend subject to above comment.
customer_reviews.author: skibee

customer_reviews.title: my knees were hurting almost instantly from walking around with what felt like cinder blocks tied to my feet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 14, the package weighed 29lbs. I'm 28 years old and 6'4", my knees were hurting almost instantly from walking around with what felt like cinder blocks tied to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M.

customer_reviews.title: He’s very particular.....
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very particular about his ‘brands’. I decided on these snow boots for his Xmas. It snowed, was 20 degrees out, and we hiked through the woods without a hitch. He loves them. Yay!! I don’t have to hear anymore complaining!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good warm boot with soft sole
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Keeps my feet warm, but sized a bit too large. I wear these boots on a muddy/rocky job site. My feet stay dry and warm, but I literally feel every pebble I step on. They have a softer sole and the tread is not very aggressive. The most important thing for me was keeping my feet warm, so I like them. If I had an opportunity to make a change to this boot, it would be a tougher sole. I wear steel toe boots with a steel shank almost year round.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Had an old pair from LL Bean and tried a different kind. The fit was horrible so I went back to Sorel. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: appear to be well made/comfortable like my previous pair.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet- exact replacement for the pair that finally gave out after five years of use on my 100 A. farm. Also deer hunting plus warm snow boots in the hilly S.W. part of wisconsin woods( get them when there is snow ) and you are assured to have them when you need them!
customer_reviews.author: mr. fixit

customer_reviews.title: Rubber cracks and leaks
customer_reviews.text: Have owned Sorels for decades until the soles wore through and were the best boots ever. The new Sorels (after company was sold) rubber cracks within two years use and leaks. I will never buy Sorels again...
customer_reviews.author: Brett Tremaine

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, too big around the foot
customer_reviews.text: Thought a 9 1/2 would be perfect but they are super wide around the toes and foot, even with heavy ski socks. Despite this I still wore them a long time and had no issues, just felt the foot sliding around and wish it was more snug to fit. Super warm and great padding up the ankle and calf. Probably would keep your feet warm in a blizzard, though I was just in Yosemite and it wasn't that cold...
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to wear the boots very long. But what I have. They seem to be what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Contreras

customer_reviews.title: I ain't Sorel I bought these.
customer_reviews.text: I ain't Sorel I bought these! They go on fast, come off fast, fit well, and keep my feet warm and dry. I sent the size 13s back and re-ordered 14s, to get a pair to fit the length of my feet. I am very pleased, now, with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Putnam Wright

customer_reviews.title: Typical Sorel.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the ones we purchased 10 years ago. However, for some reason these fit like they were a whole size to big. Will be sending back to get a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: NHEN

customer_reviews.title: excellent snow boots
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Sorel Caribous for years, and in my opinion these are the only way to go for cold snowy weather. This is the 3rd pair I've bought in 30 years. Something punctured the leather below the laces on my first pair, so I tossed them. I still have the 2nd pair, and I got this pair to leave at another location.
customer_reviews.author: T. Magee

customer_reviews.title: added insoles even the $60 super soles and my feet still hurt when walking long ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't walk for long distances in them... the arches of my feet start to hurt very quickly, added insoles even the $60 super soles and my feet still hurt when walking long distance... so they are not good for me when I am in NYC- however when we are out in the country house, and we go into town or are walking short distances they are fine... super warm, finest quality of craftsmanship and I love them-
customer_reviews.author: JazValencia

customer_reviews.title: reat gift for outdoor work
customer_reviews.text: My son works as a welder/ship fitter on the north coast of Washington. He works outside most of the time in cold damp weather during the winter months. We bought the the Sorel Caribou boots and a Carhartt Arctic Quilt Coverall for him as a Christmas gift. He is delighted and said that he doesn't have to wear much more (except a hoodie for welding) and keeps nice and warm without feeling overly bulky. The boots were a wonderful addition to the coveralls. He cuts his own wood as well and appreciates the dry warmth of these boots. Nice product..
customer_reviews.author: johnb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Great quality boots. Great price. They have good tread and are very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Half size up was too much.
customer_reviews.text: Was afraid it might be too small since I use orthotics and thick socks. Went 1/2 size up. Wearable but true size of 11 would have been better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jac Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Super warm and true to size. It’s fairly flexible too and easy to put on/take off while standing.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W

customer_reviews.title: The best winter boot!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and comfortable with grwat traction in snow, ice and mud!
customer_reviews.author: JacG

customer_reviews.title: Warm and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: After 40 years of Minnesota winters I had to replace my original Sorrel Caribous with this pair. As expected, like the first pair they’re warm and totally waterproof. The newer sole design has proven to provide excellent traction. Hopefully I’ll be checking back in 40 years from now to review this pair!
customer_reviews.author: Big John

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. My father was pleased with the boots and will continue to have me order him more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ~Vint~

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and runs very large.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great but I had to return them because they were about an inch too big. If you are a 10.5 order a 10. They are very bulky, definitely not for just casual wear. These are made to see deep snow and lots of it. Still awaiting my refund. Hopefully they will send it once they receive the package.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The air gap between outer boot and inner boot is what will keep my feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and made just right for thicker socks. Super comfortable. Fast delivery. These will be used when I visit Incline Village Lake Tahoe late January. Last year they had 10 ft. of snow and we will see if the boots hold up when we are working outside cleaning off the decks and driveway. They sure look like they will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his boots
customer_reviews.text: Boots are amazing. Dry and warm, built to last, and never a doubt. Thanks Sorel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great snow boot
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and seem to be very warm , time will test their durability. I ordered a half size small and added a footbed . Works perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: I buy these very other year for they last that ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these very other year for they last that long , in the job I do which eats the glue out from the souls delivering grain to farmer other wise they would last many more years
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered half size larger than shoe size and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, I’m a size 11.5 and ordered a 12, fit perfectly with average weight socks
customer_reviews.author: Andrew schramm

customer_reviews.title: Great Purcase
customer_reviews.text: Because of my very high instep, I had trouble getting them on originally. I trimmed away the center elastic in the liner and they went on easily and were warm and comfortable. Used them outdoors in Fairbanks at 18 below and never felt the cold. I have mobility issues and these boots provided excellent traction and support Cant say enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Ficarra

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Boot
customer_reviews.text: There is no down-side to this simple, robust boot. My first pair lasted 15 years and would probably have gone another 15 had I not let them sit too close to a camp fire. I am now on my second pair, which I may be buried in.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Parks

customer_reviews.title: These things are Beasts !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot - buy it and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Morey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my father. He was still wearing his 25 year old pair. He wore the tread on the sole alway down and had one small hole. So he was very happy to get his new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Uriostegui

customer_reviews.title: Fits correctly
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of Sorel Caribous long ago. I loved them and wore them until they were trashed. These fit as I remember. Even tried them on with thick winter socks just to make sure. They may loosen up a bit after a season but, the fit was true, sizing too.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical underdog

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot.
customer_reviews.text: I like this boot very much. It is not heavy for a winter boot, fits perfectly and Is warm. The shipping was quick. I am happy with this purchase so I recommend. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Way too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to wear it in cold winter days/snow days but its way to bulky. Its as if I'm wearing my snowboard boots. Can't bend my ankles. The top is so wide I have to wear wide leg baggy pants for my jeans to cover the boots. This version is like for the extreme snow, I think Sorel sells a lighter one with a thinner sole which should be more adequate for daily winter use. Returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: M. KIMMEL

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer
customer_reviews.text: My last Sorrels lasted 35 years before the eyelet leathers started breaking down. I imagine this next pair will outlive me!
customer_reviews.author: The Denver Dogman

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot for wet slushy snow.  RUNS SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Really like these boots, but they ran about an entire size too small. They're also very heavy, so I wouldn't recommend them for and long walking. Great for shoveling snow or any activities involving being outdoors in the cold freezing rain/snow.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT High Quality Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: These winter boots are of high quality and I recommend them for when dealing with winter.
customer_reviews.author: Karim Mohanna

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: fit like the last pair which wore out after 5 years of winters in Vermont.
customer_reviews.author: Bull-Dozer

customer_reviews.title: Wet Sorel's, why?
customer_reviews.text: We've worn sorel's for years but these leak In packed snow, my feet were warm but wet after 3 hours. The inside of the boot exteriors were wet while the felt lining were not.
customer_reviews.author: mot

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Sorel snow boots (in the last 40 years). Great snow boots. Use them for splitting wood, fillingf wood boiler and moving snow. Keeps feet warm and dry
customer_reviews.author: Jick

customer_reviews.title: size run a little bit big
customer_reviews.text: This is working for snow condition perfectly. doesn't feel cold at all and good quality and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: akiboss

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Husband normally a 12-11.5. Got the 11.5 and they fit perfectly. Great color. Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Best Mens Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the best you can get in terms of fit, comfort, durability, style, protection, warmth and weight. I know I bought them during the off season, which is when you get the best prices, but this is my third pair of Sorels. With two young boys who will be in the snow whenever it gets here I wanted to get a pair of boots that I could wear all day in the yard and on the sled hill. These are the best for keeping your feet warm and dry and comfortable all day!
customer_reviews.author: Riderw72

customer_reviews.title: Best boot I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, warm, totally waterproof. Only complaint if any is that the laces come undone if single tied due to D rings. An Eyelet at the top could stop slipping. Other than the price (Expensive) they are perfect for any cold weather. Plus I look like a lumberjack in them and girls like that!
customer_reviews.author: Trini Critic

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to seal the leather.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best snow boots I've ever owned. Had a pair when I was younger , several in between. Now a new pair, just like I remember, -25 farenheit with warm feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best winter boot out there
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these boots my entire life Being able to get new inserts makes them even better Great boots Waterproof and warm Now my children swear by them!
customer_reviews.author: timothy wollenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these boots for years and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Twang

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: With just one pair of socks feet stayed warm and dry in snow for 6 Plus hours. Best boots for wet cold weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not what i exspected
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very nice looking boots but its not water proof an they are very uncomfortible . I bought these before going to dutch harbor for work an being on my feet all day these boots became hell for me . Blisters on blisters . I had to buy insoles for comfort an i will be buying new boots with in the coming weeks .
customer_reviews.author: Swift Reply

customer_reviews.title: Sorel is the Best Winter Boot Money Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: great look, fit and feel. my son is not a fan of wearing boots but he loved this pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Burnzy22

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas to replace the pair he'd had for 25 years, which the soles had grown smooth. These boots are the perfect replacement. I did order 1/2 size bigger than his regular shoe size and that was the right decision.
customer_reviews.author: BMSnyder

customer_reviews.title: But I bought them for warmth and boy are they good at that
customer_reviews.text: Warmest boots ever! Quite comfy. definitely run large (I wear a 10.5 and needed to exchange for a 10.0). Bottom is a little stiff--sothese will take some breaking in. But I bought them for warmth and boy are they good at that!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Super product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had Sorel boots for over 30 years. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G. Fyle

customer_reviews.title: Great winter weather gear
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat large, but I wanted to add insulated insoles for extra warmth and moisture control so they worked out very well :)
customer_reviews.author: Mellor Family

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly. I like them and only time will tell how they hold up but over these past two months they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyanite

customer_reviews.title: My husband and son Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: We live in CT so Sorels are a must have for our cold and snowy winters. There's isn't another boot like them. Unfortunately we lost 3 pairs in Superstorm Sandy so when i went to replace them and found this new color, my boys were psyched. They are worth twice the price! My husband is normally a size 9.5 but they are only sold in full sizes so i got both a 9+10 so he could try them and he kept the size 9 and said they perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Joy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect boot!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these. He has been searching for just the right boots and these address every need he had. Perfect fit and height, nonslip, warm, removable insides. These are also very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: easy on and easy to tie even with my bad back. using them for hunting
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of boots to wear in the snow. They are water proof and insulated. With a nice pair of wool socks your feet stay comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: They arrived the same day and both looked great. Tried them both on a found the Sorel ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair of Sorel Caribou and a paid of North Face Chilkat II. They arrived the same day and both looked great. Tried them both on a found the Sorel quality to be far superior and the Sorel fit right and was 10 times more comfortable immediately. Only took 10 seconds to decide to return the North Face Chilkat II
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only had these for a few weeks and haven't had much inclement weather to speak of. Fit is very comfortable and true to size. The boots are wonderfully warm. Construction appears to be quite nice. I'll update my review, however, as the winter months come and go.
customer_reviews.author: Immigman

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but runs large
customer_reviews.text: Great boot - very warm and seems sturdy. The only complaint is it runs large. I wear a 9.5 or 10 typically. Bout the 9.5, then returned it for a 9.0. I am wearing the 9.0 but its too roomy feel like i may step out of the boot. Granted I have a narrow foot, but would return for an 8.5 (full size smaller) if I did not already start wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: TA_Newtown

customer_reviews.title: Sorel Caribou Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic winter boot. Waterproof and warm. I use them primarily as an after ski boot and for winter days when there is new snow on the ground. Their GREATEST advantage is that they are soft and VERY comfortable, but don't be confused... they are NOT a technical climbing or hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: rohe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfect. They are super comfortable and very warm. Shipping was super fast. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cannon

customer_reviews.title: A Great Snowboot
customer_reviews.text: My husband still has his pair from college, so when it came time for my son to go to college in a cold climate, we bought him a pair. They seem to run very large, so we had to return them. However, they are very warm and last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Liz b

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots. The trick is to order way smaller...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots, but I had to return one pair and then order another pair 1 1/2 size smaller to fit properly. I usually wear 11 1/2. - 12. I order 10 and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: WInter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to walk in, they keep your feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T. Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Great performance in a tough New England winter
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these boots through a series of tough storms in the Boston area this year (deep snow drifts, ice, wet heavy snow, rain, you name it!) Throughout all this, these boots have kept my feet bone dry and toasty warm. Traction is great, and the fit is fine (I'm normally a 13 wide, and the 13's fit great--plenty of room in the toe box). These are probably not the best choice for hiking or snowshoes, as they're a bit bulky (any boot of this type would be), but I'm able to drive a standard while wearing them with no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Great boots. I wear a 10 in Sorels and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I wear a 10 in Sorels and a 10.5 in everything else, so they are a little larger than stated. You can't lose with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dhcomp

customer_reviews.title: I really like these boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic. I am in Oslo, Norway and have been really happy with them. They keep my feet dry and warm, even while walking through a good amount of snow. The only problem I see is if you get enough snow to go over the top of the boots and it gets inside. But the removable insert makes drying it really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaaaay to big
customer_reviews.text: Amaing quality and colors. I ordered a size 11.5 because that is my normal size, thinking that it would fit ok. They are absolutley huge. I own over 15 pairs of shoes all 11.5 and 12 and theese fit like 13s. I can wear a 10.5 with thick wool socks and still have comfort. Please size a full size down when you order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have been very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. After he opened them, he put them on and wore the rest of the day. Must have been very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best Winter boots money can buy.
customer_reviews.text: The last pair lasted 23 years ..best boots in the market. Warm in a South Dakota winter.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Galvin

customer_reviews.title: To Small for a Big guy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy and I know it... These don't give enough room to be able to get my foot down in because the ankle does not spread wide enough to squeeze down into. I think its mostly due to the insert webbing not able to stretch wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: BrnFrnld

customer_reviews.title: They run slightly large
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great. They ran a little large but no problem with the amazon return and refund policy. Just ordered a pair a size smaller got my refund right away and the new pair came quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Danijim

customer_reviews.title: A must have in colder regions fasho fasho.
customer_reviews.text: Blew my expectations outta the water! If you're looking for a Grey Area between stylish and effective, look no more. I will definitely keep buying winter kix from Sorel moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: DeX

customer_reviews.title: Heavy..3lbs...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he loved them. Not for a woman for sure as they weight a TON! But well made and sharp looking warm winter boot.
customer_reviews.author: NikiIsAwesome

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: A great boot for winter activities, can't wait to get out on the ice
customer_reviews.author: K Wise

product_meta.title: SOREL - Men's Caribou Waterproof Boot for Winter
feature_bullets: STAY WARM: A good-looking boot that'll keep you warm as temperatures drop; Lace-up design with faux shearling snow cuff that wears well and goes with anything
WATERPROOF BOOT: Made with waterproof leather and features a seam-sealed waterproof construction; Keeps your feet happy, dry and protected in any weather
ALL-DAY WARMTH AND COMFORT: Features a removable 9 mm washable recycled felt inner boot for extra warmth; 2.5 mm bonded felt frost plug in the midsole provides extra insulation
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Handcrafted waterproof vulcanized rubber shell with aero-trac non-loading outsole provides extra grip for confidence in every step
FUNCTION MEETS FASHION: SOREL creates bold, always-ready footwear that's built to take on non-stop days and nights in the city
